meta.content: Tecky Arham provides premium coding tutorials, advanced WordPress themes, expert blogging insights, and comprehensive digital solutions for developers and tech enthusiasts.

b:with.value: data:view.isHomepage ? data:blog.title + (data:skin.vars.tagline ? data:skin.vars.separator + data:skin.vars.tagline : "") : data:view.isError ? "404 (Error) Not Found" + data:skin.vars.separator + data:blog.title : data:blog.pageName ? data:blog.pageName + data:skin.vars.separator + data:blog.title : "Latest Posts" + data:skin.vars.separator + data:blog.title

div.expr:class: data:i lt data:posts.length - 4 and data:posts.length > 5 ? data:i == 0 ? "splide__slide w-100 flex-shrink-0" : "splide__slide w-100 flex-shrink-0" : data:i == 0 ? "" : ""

b:class.cond: data:i gt 0 and data:i gt data:posts.length - 5 or data:posts.length lt 6
b:class.name: rounded-3

div.class: item-content max-w-80 start-0 end-0 ps-4 pb-4 position-absolute bottom-0

a.class: d-inline-block text-reset jt-bg-light rounded py-1 px-2 mb-2 me-1

h3.expr:class: data:i == 0 or data:i lt data:posts.length - 4 ? "fs-6 fs-md-4" : "fs-7 fs-md-6"

b:if.cond: (data:i == data:posts.length - 5 and data:posts.length gt 4) or (data:i == 0 and data:posts.length lt 5)
